p: As shown in Figure 7, a strong S‐phase arrest in HL‐7702 cells was been found after BaP treatment. Compared with BaP group, the treatment with BaP (63 mg/L) plus Gsp (25 mg/L) led to a significant ( p ≤ 0.01) decrease in cell population of S phase from 25.89% to 21.47%, and the cell population of G2/M phase increased from 5.04% to 7.66%. Meanwhile, cell population slight accumulation was observed on the G0/G1 phase in the tested cell lines. The results suggest that Gsp weakened cell cycle arrest ability of BaP on HL7702 cells.
